full_threads.body:
Hi Brendan,

The subscription charges for existing members will be updated on their next renewal.

Let me know if you need further assistance.

Hi @rica! No, it's not automatic. WooCommerce will not apply the discount unless a) the coupon is used at checkout or b) the order is updated.

Please see https://www.loom.com/share/4f91b054deba45629ffd81eb687a6c90?sid=3bc69ef3-829e-4111-a89d-3a402b6f34b6
